Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Amberton Lane, west of the elven shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The Elven Shrine of Corellon Larethian lies on the east side of the road as a religious reminder to all elves. The elven race is the most pre- dominant race on the land, but they tend to keep to themselves. Oceancrest is primarily a human settlement, but once outside of Oceancrest, elves vastly outnumber humans.
